snippet: A judge accepted James E. Holmes’s plea of not guilty by reason of insanity, setting the stage for a lengthy evaluation of his mental condition at the time of the shooting last year.
abstract: James E Holmes, charged with killing 12 people inside Aurora, Colo, movie theater, changes plea to not guilty by reason of insanity; expected shift in Holmes's defense sets stage for lengthy evaluation of his mental condition at time of shooting.
lead_paragraph: A judge accepted James E. Holmes’s plea of not guilty by reason of insanity, setting the stage for a lengthy evaluation of his mental condition at the time of the shooting last year.

headline.seo: Suspect in Colorado Movie Killings Enters Insanity Plea
headline.main: Suspect in Colorado Killings Enters Insanity Plea
headline.print_headline: Suspect in Colorado Killings Enters Insanity Plea
